body:
So I decided to make a throwback thread for Avicus long term players who have some experience to share. So just put your throwback moment down below. This is just for us all to have a flashback to what Avicus/MCZONE was and what we will all remember it as for as long as Avicus lives.

Mine would be the most obvious one: Prestiges!
I remember getting my first prestige on the map Curabitur. Good times..


EDIT: Decided to make it in a list form.

Throwbacks:
- Prestiges
- My IGN being "sheamus4414" (true story)
- Howsie and Gil as directors
- Directors in that matter
- Team skywars
- Walls actually being kinda popular
- Avicus player base
- Manager rank
- The first Nexus map
- 5x5 stone lobby
- Sessp's majestic kd
- Skywars
- Nether star shop
- http://imgur.com/iA43Wl9
- Spooks infractions
- Sandstone lobby
- When Senex was a new map
- G-Skippy
- This
- Storm chasers
- Gonzo
- Tino
- Doozie
- The private lobby with ender pearls
- A strong player base
- The onion-throwing shenanigans
- Steampunk DTM
- The maps committee
- Howsies threads to see if staff are all still active
- Vice and Para making Senex 3 and rendezvous 3
- Tigerman
- Everyone teamspleefing on Luar
- Vice's first interview
- Emmy doing mass account bans
- Iron winning Robo's UHC
- Iron's teamspeak crew
- When Peachy kicked Jess for "Trolling" because they were all stuck in a hole together on Ternio
- The old lobbies
- Aura's batch being promoted to senior moderator and finding out at five in the morning with countless slack messages. 
- FazerMC being Elimination god
- Sli always getting accused of hacking in Elimination.....
- Elimination for that matter
- Awesomerp being 1173rd on the leaderboard ^-^
- Birdy prestiging in Avicade
- Greg's current name (lil_greg15)
- The crits on Nexus

*Cough*

When Peachy kicked me for "Trolling" because we were all stuck in a hole together on Ternio. Ahh, Peachy's Jr Mod days :') The memories. (I'm keeping the infraction cause it's absolutely beautiful) 

Skywars... The days.

The old lobby ;3

replies.body:
First prestige on Fissura was a kinda huge achievement for me. I guess second prestige on Nordic Holiday/Axis was cool too.
The era of naked rushing, quick ending maps and hardly any defence. Rip the days

replies.body:
Remember sandstone lobby in cross shape, 8 portals and parkour, which "soon" never comes.
Remember, how nebula Chess map broke, and I played all day one match. It was built up with wood and glass. So cool.
Remember server, where sometimes I couldnt join, cause it was FULL (100/100 then).
Remeber, how players joined every mini game, not only nebula.
Remember me a noob, who defended only.
WHERE IT'S ALL GONE? *crying*
